tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an open redirect by using trailing double slashes in the URL (such as https://example.com//attacker.example/) when accessing the worker asset path. This can allow attackers to redirect users to malicious websites.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@cloudflare/workers-shared` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
